FarmLead

Website Redesign

FarmLead is a startup company that is re-imagining the grain marketing industry. They started an online marketplace for farmers to buy and sell grain that instantly connects buyers to sellers and drastically improves the process. My work with them involved designing and coding a new website that would introduce their product to new users and encourage them to explore it. Check out the live website
